sendMessages.label: izini hakɛ min ka kan ka ci walasa ka cikan ci .
sendMessages.tooltip: 0 kɔrɔ ye ko tɔndenw bɛɛ bɛ se ka cikanw ci, wa ni nimɔrɔ ka bon, o kɔrɔ ye ko yamaruyaw ka bon kosɛbɛ .

invite.label: Izini hakɛ min ka kan ka kɛ walasa ka tɔnden kuraw wele .
invite.tooltip: Set min bɛ se ka mɔgɔ kuraw wele ka na so kɔnɔ .

kick.label: Aw bɛ se ka yamaruya hakɛ min wajibiyalen don .
kick.tooltip: Set min bɛ se ka bɔ so kɔnɔmɔgɔw la .

ban.label: Izini hakɛ min ka kan ka kɛ mɔgɔw balili la .
ban.tooltip: Set min bɛ se ka so kɔnɔmɔgɔw bali .

roomSettings.label: Yɛlɛma don ka kɛɲɛ ni so sigicogo ye min wajibiyalen don .
roomSettings.tooltip: Set min bɛ se ka so sigicogo sɛmɛntiya .

PermissionSettingsContent.description: Permis level range: 0-100, ni jate ka bon, o kɔrɔ ye ko izini caman bɛ ɲini

toast.error: A ma se ka yamaruyaw di .
